text:
These don't look like K-Cups but they work perfectly in your Keurig Coffee Maker.
I have to say that hands down this is the best coffee I've made in my Keurig in the Year that I've had it. I like a lot of the different Brews but this is really Rich in Flavor with a nice Body! Haven't experienced that with any of the K-Cups up to this point. I'm glad I signed up for Auto Delivery for these, and I'll look forward to my Monthly stipend!
